thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CNP Assurances Takes A Majority Stake Into Azimut And Isalud‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CNP Assurances Takes A Majority Stake Into Azimut And Isalud‍​
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Cnp Assurances:
* TAKES A MAJORITY STAKE INTO TWO INSURTECHS, AZIMUT AND ISALUD‍​
* ISALUD OPERATES IN SPAIN AND AZIMUT IN FRANCE * THIS EUR 40 MILLION INVESTMENT ALLOWS CNP ASSURANCES TO ACQUIRE MAJORITY STAKES
* WITH EUR 10 MILLION, CNP ASSURANCES WILL HAVE A 70% SHAREHOLDING INTO AZIMUT
* WITH EUR 30 MILLION, CNP ASSURANCES WILL PROGRESSIVELY REACH 60% SHAREHOLDING INTO ISALUD BY EARLY 2019 Source text; bit.ly/2DLXzOn Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
